<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Undead Companion](/Feats.aspx?ID=2350) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Dhampir" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=215" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 27 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
an animal companion or a familiar

</column>

---

Your companion is also touched by undeath, a mix of a traditional companion and a skeleton, zombie, or stranger form of unlife. Your companion gains the [undead](/Traits.aspx?ID=160) trait instead of the [animal](/Traits.aspx?ID=9) trait and gains [negative healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=42). It otherwise uses the normal rules for an animal companion or familiar; that means it can still be affected by many conditions or effects to which most undead are immune.
name: Undead Companion
prerequisite: an animal companion or a familiar
